org.apache.flex.swf.types

Class RGB

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flex.swf.types.RGB
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IDataType
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    RGBA

    public class RGB
extends Object
implements IDataType
    The RGB record represents a color as a 24-bit red, green, and blue value.
